description: Finite state machine for a priority queue interactive module where users can add and remove items based on priority.
notes: The application starts in the 'idle' state. Users can add items with a specified priority or remove the highest priority item. The 'addingItem' state handles the addition of items and transitions back to 'idle' upon success or invalid input. The 'removingItem' state handles the removal of the highest priority item and transitions back to 'idle' based on the outcome.
